body:
This represents the official release of Apicurio Studio, version 0.2.26.Final.

The following issues have been resolved in this release:

* [#731](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/731) removed as many http URL refs as possible, upgrading to https
* [#730](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/730) Small improvements of ITs and PR #722
* [#727](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/727) Bug: The "Invite a Collaborator" button appears for Collaborators
* [#722](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/722) Initial integration test for single node apicurio with keycloak. Fixes #702
* [#718](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/718) Import from SC: Fails when using local GL/GH/BB
* [#717](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/717) Publish: Problem with UX flow when there is only 1 Project for the user (GitLab)
* [#715](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/715) Problems converting Pet Store 2.0 to 3.0
* [#712](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/712) Validation Profiles: Add support for customizable Validation Profiles
* [#707](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/707) #700 added docker-compose distro without reverse proxy and SSL support
* [#704](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/704) Integration with Microcks template
* [#703](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/703) Implement "Clone Response" action
* [#702](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/702) Create integration tests with Keycloak
* [#701](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/701) Publish to Bitbucket fails
* [#700](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/700) Create standalone docker distribution (based on docker compose)
* [#699](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/699) Issue with Running  docker contianer on single node  
* [#697](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/697) Implement an action to delete all examples. Fixes #535
* [#696](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/696) Generate Project: Support Simple JAX-RS projects
* [#695](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/695) Generate Project: Cannot publish to root of GH repo
* [#694](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/694) Editor: Disable native auto-complete for Drop-Down filter text box
* [#679](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/679) Support "file" as an option for OpenAPI 2 form body parameters
* [#649](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/649) Convert Apicurio masthead to PatternFly 4
* [#640](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/640) Updating readme for #639
* [#639](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/639) Update README with quickstart instructions.
* [#535](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/535) Editor: Implement a "Delete All Examples" action for examples
* [#533](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/533) Editor: Implement "Clone Response" action
* [#172](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/172) API Editor: Support Header Parameters


For more information, please see the Apicurio Studio's official project site:

* [General Information](http://www.apicur.io/)
* [Download/Quickstart](http://www.apicur.io/download)
* [Blog](http://www.apicur.io/blog)
name: Beta 2.26
